resources.string: A1. Tasty is an Indian restaurant aggregator and food delivery App. Tasty provides information, menus and user-reviews of restaurants as well as food delivery options from partner restaurants in select cities.
Q2. Is single order from many restaurants possible?
A2. We currently do not support this functionality.
Q3. Is there a minimum order value?
A3. We have no minimum order value and you can order for any amount.
Q4. Will Tasty be accountable for quality/quantity?
A4. Quantity and quality of the food is the restaurants\' responsibility. However in case of issues with the quality or quantity, kindly submit your feedback and we will pass it on to the restaurant.
Can\'t find any Restaurant with that name!
